messages.message: interesting. @William Helmrath I remember seeing timezone before?
@Josh Rad I don’t think we ever included the timezone in the designs
But this is a good point, we can add the timezone for clarification. It displays in the user’s local timezone
awesome! should we create a ticket for this or is it simple enough to implement? it feels like we should turn off the banner if it doesn't include time zone (since that can be confusing).
It’s a quick fix. I think it should be fine to leave the banner enabled until then, the doc page linked through the “Learn more” button includes the timezone
